products.title: Palate Lace White Roller Blind
products.description: The palate lace white is one of the whitest fabrics in their blackout roller blind range. Suitable for neutral environments or locations that need a bit of purity. Being a blackout blind makes this is perfect for bedrooms to get a great nights sleep without the worry if light seeping through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Day & Night Flecked White
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. products.title: Faro White Vertical Blind
products.description: The faro white vertical blind featuring its modern pattern with textured streaks, the slight contrast in texture makes this blind an aesthetically pleasing choice. The crisp white colour of this blind makes it both versatile and stylish, if this sounds good to you, this blind might just be perfect for your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Snowfall Roller Blind
products.description: Cool and crisp, the splash frost is like a clear winter's morning without a cloud in the sky. The true beauty of this slightly thinner dimout blind is that in direct sunlight it will glow with a gentle intensity that soothes the soul and gives the entire room a slightly heavenly vibe. Perfect for neutral tone bedrooms, when the sun rises and illuminates the fabric you will wake up feeling at peace and to the sound of harps.

products.title: Burst White Lotus Roller Blind
products.description: Add some serenity to your home with the pure white of the burst white lotus roller blind. This blind will gently filter the light entering through your window, helpfully stopping any glare pestering you whilst you try to watch tv. These blinds are a dimout material so will gently filter the light making them ideal for living rooms, kitchens and bathrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Sugar White Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The soft white colour of the sugar white aluminium venetian blind is perfect for those who don't want a bright, glossy white slat in their window, but are after something less stark and a little bit warmer. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Gibson Perfect White Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson perfect white is a beautiful blind that gives a bright and airy feel even when closed. A solid colour fabric, it works brilliantly in smaller rooms as the pale colouration visually extends the space. Designed to suit damp conditions, the blind's hardwearing fabric is wipe-clean and fire retardant, so it can work in tricky spaces such as bathrooms and kitchens. Choose to have controls on either the left or right according to what best suits your layout.

products.title: Gibson White Dove Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson white dove is a light beige coloured roller blind, use this with brighter colourful decors. Don't pair it with magnolia - otherwise, you might night know where the walls start and the blind ends. This blind is however, brilliant for a bathroom. The fabric is 100% waterproof, making it ideal for placing in a hot, steamy bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: White Blackout Blind For Velux  Skylights
products.description: Some would say that this blind is too white. Those people are wrong. Being such a sharp white can only be a good thing, as it allows this blind to work like a dream in those crisp, monochromatic schemes that are so popular in homes around the country.

products.title: Amor White Lotus With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor white lotus and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Amor Snowfall With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Amor snowfall with haze pure double roller blind combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor snowfall and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds.

Matching beautifully with its white upvc frame, the innovative perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free, fuss-free fit. The dimout style allows a gentle scatter of light to filter through even when the blind is closed, to enable both light and privacy together, making this an ideal choice for 'daytime' rooms such sunrooms and living rooms.
